name: State
comment: Contains a valid list of geographic areas, namely, states, which represents a first level legal and political subdivision of a country. For example, Ontario, New York
vf short description: Contains a valid list of geographic areas, namely, states, which represents a first level legal and political subdivision of a country. For example, Ontario, New York

fields.name: StateKey
fields.comment: Unique identifier to represent the state in ALDM. Each state key value represents a unique state. Generated Key based on State Id

fields.name: StateDesc
fields.comment: Name of the state. shortLabelDisplay//Customization Instruction: Check the actual column name during implementation

fields.name: StateId
fields.comment: Unique identifier to represent the state in the source system. stateOrProvince

fields.name: StateCodeId
fields.comment: Indicates the short code of the State or Province. stateOrProvince

fields.name: SourceSystemId
fields.comment: Represents the code of the source system that the leading entity of the current target is coming from. It is suffix also include the code of the DB instance on that system such that in case of multiple instances of the same source system are deployed (Scalability) it will be possible to trace the target to it is source system instance

fields.name: DeleteIndicator
fields.comment: Set to True when the leading source entity of this target entity was deleted in the source system

fields.name: Insert_Load_Id
fields.comment: BI technical field for job id which inserted the record in the table

fields.name: Update_Load_Id
fields.comment: BI technical field for job id which updated the record in the table
